name: QQLink
0:
”Alexa, show me the front camera”
”Alexa, talk to front camera”
”Alexa, Stop”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With Brillcam IP camera, you can stay connected with what you are in anywhere and any time, access your Brillcam IP camera using voice command. Free your hands and enjoy your smart life !

How to get skill?
1. Install your mobile app name is Brillview and login in it, search all device of IP camera. so you can working on the mobile app.
2. From Alexa app, find and enable Brillcam IP camera skill, login with your mobile app account.
3. Tap DISCOVER DEVICES in Alexa app to discover your Brillcam IP camera.
4. Setting for IP camera in Alexa app: open IP camera Press, open unlock by app and setting unlock password, open unlock by voice.

After linking your Brillcam account and discover your device in your Alexa account, you can start control IP camera to your echo show with voice command like:
"Alexa, show me the front camera"

if you want stop the Brillcam IP camera from the video, you can say:
"Alexa, stop"

Compatible Amazon Alexa device
* Echo Show
* Echo spot
* Echo Show 2nd gen

Important Notes:
the IP camera support two way talk from Alexa to IP camera.
when you use this skill, you need to specify the name of your IP camera.

more information you can visit http://www.brovotech.com/
if you have any questions for our skill, please contact our support: http://www.brovotech.com/about/contact.html
